title.zh: 关于是否使用26赛季最新进展

content.en: The developers announce that they will NOT incorporate the latest progress of 2026 season rules and drivers into the BETA 3.1 & 3.2 version. This is because they have scarce development time and they really want to preserve a Chinese driver in the game. However, there is possibility that the 2026 season pack will be included as a DLC after the release of Release 2026.0.
content.zh: 开发组宣布，他们将不会在公测版中加入26赛季元素，而是保留已有的24赛季阵容。一方面，开发组为学业所迫没有充足的时间开发新规；另一方面，他们也希望中国的车迷能够享受祖国的骄傲融入游戏中。尽管如此，他们正在考虑在正式版发布后将26新规作为DLC加入游戏。

title.en: BREAKING: NO CHINESE GP TICKETS FOR DEVELOPERS!
title.zh: 突发！开发组没搞到上海站门票！

content.en: It is 11:00 AM when the Chinese GP tickets released. However, the developers did NOT manage to GIT the tickets in time!!! It was such an embarrassing moment for the developers as lots of their classmates ran around celebrating for getting their tickets. We are really sorry for this, and will do the best to participate in Chinese GP in other ways.
content.zh: 上午11:00，上海站正式开票！不过...开发组居然没能搞到上海站的一张门票！这真是太尴尬了，开发组不得不在全校车迷们奔走相告时默不作声，不过我们一定会想法子融入上海站的氛围。

title.en: Delta Dash 3.1 Beta Release On the Move!
title.zh: Delta Dash 3.1 Beta版本即将发布！

content.en: After a long long wait, we are finally releasing the beta version of Delta Dash in 2025! This update includes new track layouts, enhanced strategy tools, and entirely refined UI. Get ready for the most exciting F1 boardgame experience yet!
content.zh: 经过漫长的等待，我们终于将在2025年看到DeltaDash的公测！此更新包括新的赛道布局、增强的策略系统和全面升级的用户界面。准备好迎接最激动人心的F1桌游体验吧！

title.en: Rebranding - We are now called Delta Dash!

content.en: After fans and internal voting, we finally decide to rename the game as 'Delta Dash', representing the calculation of F1 strategies and the thrill of wheel-to-wheel combat!
content.zh: 经过粉丝和内部投票，我们最终决定将游戏重命名为'Delta Dash'（分秒必杀），象征F1策略的计算和轮对轮战斗分秒必争。
